title: [Bug] Editing after already editing in a Reply
body:
STR:
Reply to someone's post.
Edit your reply and save it.
Go back a minute later and click edit.

Actual result: The edit box will fill with your original unedited post, losing any intermediate changes.
Expected result: The edit box should show the current version.

replies.body: Could you provide the browser/system information for this bug? I can't seem to reproduce it.
Awesome, was able to confirm this. Thanks!

This happens all the time with me. 

* Win 7 & 8.1
* Latest versions of:
 * IE
 * Firefox
 * Chrome
 * Opera
